Class SmoothMover

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • MoveWMouse
        • SmoothMover
  • public abstract class SmoothMover
extends MoveWMouse
    A variation of an actor that maintains precise location (using doubles for the co-ordinates instead of ints). It also maintains a current velocity in form of a velocity vector.
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Poul Henriksen, Michael KÃ¶lling (Including improvements suggested by J. Buhl.)
